attributes.action: allow Chris Raynor back into Heyside Cricket Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the free peoples of greater Manchester argue the case to prevent Chris Raynor from entering the Heyside Cricket Club in tandem with a situation which was judged to be a grievance.

For the prime minister not to allow Chris Raynor in to this establishment will cause ruptures throughout the north west and therefore must be overturned for the welfare of the country.

furthermore, when people are wrongly judged in a court of law, they are entitled to an appeal, yet this has been overlooked within Heyside Cricket Club and the committee which stood by the punishment must therefore be deemed unlawful.

happy new year!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
